      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10544326">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10544326">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10544326">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding More
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10544326">
          <p href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/aecontent.php?pid=353707&amp;sid=2893499">
           For recommendations beyond the core resources listed on this page, use the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357836&amp;sid=2978369">
            Finding Background Information
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357836&amp;sid=2950411">
            Finding Articles
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357836&amp;sid=2978371">
            Finding Books
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357836&amp;sid=2996444">
            Finding Government Documents
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357836&amp;sid=2978383">
            Finding Data &amp; Statistics
           </a>
           , and
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357836&amp;sid=2978374">
            Citations
           </a>
           tabs across the top.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10544326" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10268024">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10268024">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10268024">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Additional Resources by Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_2" id="content10268024">
          <p>
           Find specific recommendations by course:
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10268024" class="boxatt">
           <div class="linklist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12484950">
              <a id="link_12484950" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/americanforeignpolicy" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12484950,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12484950});">
               American Foreign Policy
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link22650121">
              <a id="link_22650121" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/americanpoliticalthought" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22650121,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22650121});">
               American Political Thought
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12484957">
              <a id="link_12484957" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/ciep" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12484957,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12484957});">
               Comp. &amp; Int. Environmental Policies
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link18390941">
              <a id="link_18390941" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/envpol" target="_blank" onclick="hit(18390941,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18390941});">
               Environmental Politics
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12484968">
              <a id="link_12484968" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/inequality" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12484968,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12484968});">
               Inequality &amp; U.S. Public Policy
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12484970">
              <a id="link_12484970" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/ilo" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12484970,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12484970});">
               Int. Law &amp; Organization
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link23554632">
              <a id="link_23554632" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/intenvpol" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23554632,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23554632});">
               International Environmental Policy
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link13636198">
              <a id="link_13636198" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/ipe" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13636198,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13636198});">
               International Political Economy
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link25266404">
              <a id="link_25266404" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/ocean" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25266404,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25266404});">
               Ocean Resource Management
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link13186642">
              <a id="link_13186642" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/researchmethodspsc" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13186642,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13186642});">
               Research Methods
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12484978">
              <a id="link_12484978" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/theoriesir" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12484978,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12484978});">
               Theories of International Relations
              </a>
             </li>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10544157">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10544157">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10544157">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Resources for Finding Articles and Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10544157">
          <div id="boxatt10544157" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12810714">
              <a id="link_12810714" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.ciaonet.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12810714,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706271}); ">
               Columbia International Affairs Online (CIAO)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journal articles, working papers, policy briefs, conference proceedings, and more in the area of international affairs theory and research.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12810715">
              <a id="link_12810715" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/pais/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12810715,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706272}); ">
               PAIS
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more from on domestic and international political, economic, social and public policy issues.  Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12810727">
              <a id="link_12810727" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/wpsashell/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12810727,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706275}); ">
               Worldwide Political Science Abstracts
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more in political science and complementary fields, including international relations, law, and public administration/policy.  Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24636778">
              <a id="link_24636778" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24636778,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24636766}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search finds information by searching through a massive collection of books and scholarly journals, as well as newspapers and magazines, dissertations, conference proceedings, music, video, maps, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10544159">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10544159">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10544159">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Resources for Finding Background Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10544159">
          <div id="boxatt10544159" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12810743">
              <a id="link_12810743" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12810743,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas, including many notable titles for political science. Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12810744">
              <a id="link_12810744" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.europaworld.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12810744,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808405}); ">
               Europa World Year Book
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief statistics by country on a variety of topics, including: area and population, health and welfare, agriculture, industry, trade, transport, education, and more.
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12810751">
              <a id="link_12810751" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://library.cqpress.com/phw/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12810751,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12809045}); ">
               Political Handbook of the World
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Information by country on a variety of topics, including: government and politics, constitution, foreign affairs, political and opposition parties, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10544169">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10544169">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10544169">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Citation Resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10544169">
          <div id="boxatt10544169" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25609734">
              <a id="link_25609734" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25609734,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25609730}); ">
               Citation Guides (Muhlenberg College)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Examples of citation formatting in APA, Chicago, and MLA styles.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12810692">
              <a id="link_12810692" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.chicagomanualofstyle.org/16/contents.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12810692,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12809881}); ">
               The Chicago Manual of Style
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The authoritative and complete manual for Chicago Style.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12810703">
              <a id="link_12810703" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12810703,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12373526}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources."  Download instructions and help available on the site.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
